column4: hi there, i have a problem with GNOME: when i login i only see the background, but no menus, no iconms, nothing else appears. do u know if there is a gnome logfile to check to see what was the error opr what's happening? I installed kubuntu and if i login using kde: no problem.
one solution to figure out what went wrong, is to rightclick (if you can) on the background and select "run terminal" and start "gnome-panel" from that terminal.
danko: i have the impression nothing is loading
